sourcesContent:
<template>
  <PortfolioList
    title="动画作品"
    description="展示创意动画作品，分享动画技巧"
    type="animation"
    :categories="animationCategories"
    :menu-groups="animationMenuGroups"
  />
</template>

<script setup>
import PortfolioList from '@/components/portfolio/PortfolioList.vue'

const animationCategories = [
  { id: 'all', name: '全部' },
  {
    id: '2d',
    name: '2D动画',
    children: [
      { id: 'motion', name: '动态图形' },
      { id: 'character', name: '角色动画' },
      { id: 'explainer', name: '解释动画' }
    ]
  },
  {
    id: '3d',
    name: '3D动画',
    children: [
      { id: '3d-character', name: '角色动画' },
      { id: 'product', name: '产品动画' },
      { id: 'architectural', name: '建筑动画' }
    ]
  },
  {
    id: 'interactive',
    name: '交互动画',
    children: [
      { id: 'ui', name: 'UI动效' },
      { id: 'web', name: '网页动画' },
      { id: 'game', name: '游戏动画' }
    ]
  }
]

const animationMenuGroups = [
  {
    title: '动画分类',
    items: animationCategories.map(category => ({
      name: category.name,
      path: `/portfolio/animation?category=${category.id}`,
      icon: category.id === 'all' ? HomeIcon :
            category.id === '2d' ? Square2StackIcon :
            category.id === '3d' ? CubeIcon :
            SparklesIcon
    }))
  }
]
</script>
